notice.title: Important Notice
notice.text: These terms govern your use of DentalHub's B2B marketplace platform. Please read carefully before using our services.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using DentalHub ("Platform", "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access the Service.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: DentalHub is a B2B e-commerce platform that connects dental professionals, including dentists, dental clinics, suppliers, and technicians in the United States. Our platform facilitates:
list: Product discovery and comparison across multiple verified suppliers
Secure transaction processing and payment handling
Professional license verification and compliance monitoring
Customer support and dispute resolution services

sections.title: 3. User Account Registration
sections.content: To access certain features of our Service, you must register for an account. When creating an account, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for:

sections.title: 4. Professional License Verification
sections.content: All dental professionals must provide valid license information for verification. We reserve the right to verify credentials through state licensing boards and third-party verification services. Falsification of professional credentials will result in immediate account termination and may be reported to relevant regulatory authorities.

sections.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
sections.content: You may not use our Service:
items: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations or laws
To transmit or procure the sending of advertising or promotional material
To impersonate or attempt to impersonate another person or entity
To engage in any other conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use of the Service
To use automated systems to access the Service without authorization
To circumvent any content filtering techniques or security features
To interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers or networks

notice.title: Your Privacy Matters
notice.text: We are committed to protecting your personal information and respecting your privacy rights in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the collected information for various purposes, including but not limited to:

sections.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share your information with trusted partners who assist us in operating our platform, conducting business, or serving our users.

notice.title: HIPAA Compliance Commitment
notice.text: DentalHub is committed to maintaining the highest standards of healthcare information privacy and security in compliance with HIPAA regulations.

sections.title: Protected Health Information (PHI)
sections.content: While DentalHub primarily facilitates B2B commerce transactions and does not typically handle patient health information, we recognize that some interactions may involve Protected Health Information (PHI). We have implemented comprehensive safeguards to ensure HIPAA compliance when such information is present.

sections.title: Administrative Safeguards
items: Incident response and breach notification protocols

sections.title: Technical Safeguards
items: Secure database storage with encryption at rest

sections.title: Physical Safeguards
sections.content: We maintain physical safeguards to protect PHI:

cards.title: Facility Access
cards.text: Controlled access to data centers and office facilities with biometric authentication

cards.title: Workstation Security
cards.text: Secured workstations with automatic screen locks and authorized personnel access only

cards.title: Media Controls
cards.text: Secure handling, storage, and disposal of electronic media containing PHI

sections.title: Business Associate Agreements
sections.content: DentalHub enters into Business Associate Agreements (BAAs) with covered entities when necessary. These agreements ensure that all parties understand their responsibilities for protecting PHI and maintaining HIPAA compliance throughout our business relationship.
